text: David Novák (born 11 January 1979) is a retired Czech football player who played in the Czech First League for FC Viktoria Plzeň. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic youth international footballers Category:Czech Republic under-21 international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Czech First League players Category:FC Viktoria Plzeň players
title: David Novák
